short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Discover your favorite real estate, priced in Bitcoin and Ethereum. Skip the fiat hassle and step into the future of home buying.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Coincasa is an innovative, cost-free browser add-on that provides a unique service. It has the capability to display real estate prices in either Bitcoin or Ethereum, two of the most popular cryptocurrencies. This feature allows potential buyers to view properties in terms of these digital currencies. If a user finds a house they are interested in and wishes to purchase it, they don't have to worry about the process. Our dedicated team at Coincasa will step in to facilitate the transaction. We will reach out and liaise with the relevant parties to ensure the purchase happens smoothly and efficiently. Coincasa is not just a tool; it's a complete service that bridges the gap between cryptocurrency and real estate.

At the moment extension is compatible with:
- redfin.com
- zillow.com
- trulia.com

*This is still an Alpha product, please be patient with our response time.
